title: Front Line Assembly, Delerium - Cryogenic Studio 2 Bill Leeb
description:
The full title is "Front Line Assembly, Bill Leeb, Friends & Company - Cryogenic Studio Volume 02"

Double CD compilation from 2000 of various Bill Leeb projects  (when does this guy sleep?).  I'm not sure how "limited edition" this set actually was.  I think every copy had the same pseudo-serial number printed on the outer cardboard slipcase.

Being a Cleopatra release, this had its usual share of mislabeled songs on the CD case.  Below is the proper track listing.  I also added the year of release to the songs' names in the files.  

1-1 	Noise Unit - Paradise     8:38   
1-2 	Noise Unit - Biosphere     9:37   
1-3 	Delerium - Amnesia     9:21   
1-4 	Pro-Tech - Eros     6:43   
1-5 	Equinox - Phenomena     5:46   
1-6 	Synaesthesia - Door To The Other Side     11:14   
1-7 	Noise Unit - The Drain     6:50   
1-8 	Front Line Assembly - Amorphous     4:56   

2-1 	Noise Unit - Miracle     6:46   
2-2 	Noise Unit - Inner Chaos     7:52   
2-3 	Delerium - Ambience     4:48   
2-4 	Equinox - Electronic Dream     9:03   
2-5 	Pro-Tech - Re-Thread     7:44   
2-6 	Synaesthesia - Floatation     8:38   
2-7 	Noise Unit - Alle Gegan Alle     4:32   
2-8 	Noise Unit - Penance     6:05   
2-9 	Front Line Assembly - Mutate 	5:42

.wma in a variable bit rate

***********************

Grab and go is never cool.  Please help keep these torrents alive.  Whenever you grab a torrent, you should continue to seed for others, at least until your ratio reaches 1.0 or higher.  I'm still kind of new to this, but I believe that if you make any changes to what you've downloaded or move them from their original download location, it will stop seeding.  I usually COPY my music files from my download folder to an empty folder on my desktop, rename them how I like, then add them to my music library.  This leaves the torrent in its original condition and location so it will seed for others.

We've all been frustrated by dead and incomplete torrents.  This wouldn't happen if everyone seeded until their ratio got over 1.
